thread.title: Here’s What the Team at SATATTTVISION Is Wearing Right Now
thread.title_full: Here’s What the Team at SATATTTVISION Is Wearing Right Now

author: Brock Cardiner
title: Here’s What the Team at SATATTTVISION Is Wearing Right Now
text:
Visit the original post to see all 7 images from this gallery. 
Following recent stops in London , Melbourne, Paris, Berlin and New York, Highsnobiety’s roaming series of retailer spotlights heads to Milan to see what the staff at SATATTTVISION is wearing right now.
Much more than just a tattoo studio, the crew has an interest in fashion and design, in addition to producing custom grillz. The shop’s been open for about a year now and in that time their client list has shot up tremendously, in part due to their unique studio layout which includes pieces like Medicom Bearbricks, OG Obey artwork and a Nike shoot signed by Kobe Bryant when he visited Milan.
Looking through the photos below, astute readers will also notice pieces from rap clothier Pauly, better known as @himumimdead . Notable tattoo clients of the shop include Marcelo Burlon and A$AP Bari.
Check out what the staff is rocking below and make sure to drop by should you find yourself in the Italian fashion capital.
SATATTTVISION 
Via Alessandro Tadino, 3
